subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Since returning Jan. 11 against Chicago, the 6-foot-3, 200-pound Mikko Koivu has blossomed into the type of two-way power center the Wild envisioned when it drafted him sixth over all in 2001.
snippet: Since returning Jan. 11 against Chicago, the 6-foot-3, 200-pound Mikko Koivu has blossomed into the type of two-way power center the Wild envisioned when it drafted him sixth over all in 2001.
